name: WineMaking
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: Discover our wine making process and taste from our oak barrels. Learn about vine pruning from someone who actually has done the work. Listen to the story behind our vineyard and meet fellow travellers and wine fans. Our generous tasting portions will leave you smiling smugly as you think of your friends working back home. Experience our unforgettable wine and food celebration; a different bottle with every course. See the magic of our vineyards at sunset.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
